name: Don Knotts Movies Online Trivia | People Themed | 10 Questions

questions.text: In which of these movies was Knotts the voice of an animated character?
In the movie where Knotts was the voice of an animated character, what type of animal did Knotts voice?
Who was Knotts' character in 'The Ghost and Mr. Chicken'?
In 'The Ghost and Mr. Chicken', what occupation did Knotts' character have at the beginning?
questions.explanation:
Typesetter.

	His desire was to be a reporter, but he began the movie as a typesetter in the basement of the local newspaper.

questions.text: In what Knotts movie is his character put on trial for obscenity?
questions.explanation:
'The Love God?'.

	As Abner Peacock, the editor of a bird watcher's journal, he is duped into letting a smut peddler turn the journal into a risque publication.

questions.text: Knotts played Wheely Applegate in the 1977 movie about a Volkswagen that had a mind of its own. What was the name of the car?
questions.explanation:
Herbie.

	Knotts played in the movie 'Herbie Goes to Monte Carlo'.

questions.text: In which of these movies did Don Knotts NOT appear in?
In what movie did Leslie Nielsen co-star with Knotts?
questions.explanation:
'The Reluctant Astronaut'.

	Nielsen played Major Fred Gifford in this movie about a carnival kiddy ride operator who mistakenly became an astronaut.

questions.text: Now for some personal Don Knotts stuff. Where was Knotts born?
questions.explanation:
Morgantown, West Virginia.

	He was born Jesse Donald Knotts in Morgantown on July 21, 1924.

questions.text: From 1989-1991 Knotts teamed up with Andy Griffith again playing Les Calhoun, on what famous TV series?
questions.explanation:
Matlock.

	The series ran from 1986-1995. Knotts' appearances were only for a part of that time (1989-1991). He also starred as landlord Mr. Furley on the sitcom 'Threes Company'.
